DevSecOpsDashboard.description: Central DevSecOps dashboard with pipelines, security, deployments, and infrastructure overview.

PipelineList.description: List of CI/CD pipelines with filtering and search.

PipelineCard.description: Compact pipeline status card for list views.

PipelineStatus.description: Detailed CI/CD pipeline status with stages and current state.

PipelineStage.description: A single stage in a CI/CD pipeline.

PipelineControls.description: Control bar for pipeline actions (trigger, cancel, retry).

PipelineHistory.description: Pipeline run history with trend visualization.

JobCard.description: Individual job within a pipeline stage.

ArtifactList.description: List of build artifacts from pipeline runs.

ArtifactCard.description: Individual build artifact with download option.

SecurityDashboard.description: Security overview dashboard with vulnerability trends and scan results.

SecuritySummary.description: Compact security status summary for dashboards.

SecurityFinding.description: A single security vulnerability or issue.

VulnerabilityTrend.description: Chart showing vulnerability trends over time.

DependencyList.description: List of project dependencies with vulnerability status.

DependencyCard.description: Individual dependency with version and vulnerability info.

DeploymentCard.description: Compact deployment card for list views.

EnvironmentMap.description: Visual map showing deployment flow across environments.

RollbackDialog.description: Rollback confirmation dialog with version selection.

ReleaseList.description: List of releases with version history.

ReleaseCard.description: Compact release card for list views.

ObserveDashboard.description: Central observability dashboard with navigation, health overview, and content areas.

ObserveHealthBar.description: System-wide health status bar with key indicators.

MetricsDashboard.description: Dashboard showing key metrics with sparklines and current values.

MetricsToolbar.description: Toolbar for filtering and configuring metrics display.

MetricWidget.description: A single metric value with trend indicator.

MetricChart.description: Time series chart showing metric over time.

MetricComparison.description: Side-by-side comparison of metrics across time periods or segments.

LogViewer.description: Log viewer with filtering, search, and live tail capabilities.

LogEntry.description: A single log entry with timestamp, level, and message.

LogEntryExpanded.description: Expanded view of a log entry with full metadata.

TraceExplorer.description: Distributed trace explorer with search and filtering.

TraceToolbar.description: Toolbar for trace search and filtering.

TraceList.description: List of traces with summary information.

TraceCard.description: Summary card for a single trace.

TraceView.description: Distributed trace view showing request flow across services.

TraceSpan.description: A single span in a distributed trace.

SpanDetails.description: Detailed view of a single span.

AlertPanel.description: Panel showing active and recent alerts.

AlertToolbar.description: Toolbar for alert filtering and actions.

AlertItem.description: A single alert with severity and status.

AlertDetails.description: Detailed view of an alert with history and actions.

ObserveServiceMap.description: Visual service dependency map with health indicators.

ServiceList.description: List of services with health status.

SLODashboard.description: Dashboard for SLO monitoring and error budgets.

SLOStatus.description: Service Level Objective status with budget.

SLODetails.description: Detailed SLO view with history and burndown.

QuickFilters.description: Quick filter panel for common queries.

ComplianceDashboard.description: Central compliance dashboard with framework status, audit findings, and upcoming reviews.

FrameworkList.description: List of compliance frameworks with status overview.

ComplianceStatus.description: Overall compliance status for a framework.

ComplianceScoreCard.description: Visual compliance score display with trend.

ControlList.description: List of compliance controls with status.

ControlItem.description: A single compliance control with evidence status.

ControlDetails.description: Detailed view of a compliance control.

EvidenceList.description: List of evidence artifacts for a control.

FindingsList.description: List of audit findings with filtering.

PrivacyInventory.description: Data inventory showing PII/PHI locations and handling.

DataElement.description: A data element with classification and handling requirements.

DSARList.description: List of data subject access requests.

devsecops-show-pipeline-status.description: Show detailed CI/CD pipeline status and stages

devsecops-show-security-scan.description: Show security scan results and findings

observe-show-metric-details.description: Show detailed view of a metric

observe-show-slos.description: Show SLO status and error budgets

compliance-show-compliance-status.description: Show compliance status for a framework

compliance-show-controls.description: Show compliance controls and their status

compliance-show-control-details.description: Show detailed control view with evidence

compliance-show-audit-trail.description: Show audit trail of compliance events
